author: doll
msg: SHINDIG-200 Added a new java module called server. This module runs both the gadget rendering and social servers which allows the samplecontainer to work again. Will update the READMEs very shortly

author: bdelacretaz
msg: SLING-389 - prevent NPE in ScriptableNode.getIds(). Also removed superfluous ScriptableNode default constructor.

author: gdamour
msg: GBean name property is now optional. This way @GBean can be used either to configure name or j2eeType or both.

author: aidan
msg: QPID-832 pass a genuine connection so that it doesnt NPE
